dict.acceptation: 实践的，实际的；可实现的，实用的；注重实际的；可用的；

sent.orig: Because the paper's analysis and design is based on a practical example, itemphasizes practical application.
sent.trans: 本论文是基于一个实例的分析和设计，所以突出于实际应用。

sent.orig: This idea has emphasis theoretic and practical significance to practical system.
sent.trans: 这对实际的卫星通信系统具有重要的理论与实际意义。

sent.orig: Practical teaching is an important link in the cultivating of the practical in higher vocational colleges.
sent.trans: 实践教学是高职高专院校培养技术应用型人才的重要环节。

sent.orig: We have proved the practical value of paper by analyzing many practical examples of belle.
sent.trans: 通过大量的百丽实际案例分析验证了本文的实际应用价值。

sent.orig: At last, essay introduces the circumstance in shanghai human capital and practical feasibility a practical case.
sent.trans: 最后，文章具体介绍了上海的人力资本出资现状和实践意义，作为人力资本出资实践的案例分析。
